item.title: 股票大涨后空头濒临灭绝
item.description:
由于看跌的投资者面临各方威胁，押注股票下跌的业务正在萎缩 。【原文：

The business of betting on stock declines is shrinking as bearish investors face threats on all sides.

】

item.title: 解决主要熊市担忧后，苹果公司 2024 年业绩转好
item.description: 周一，苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Apple Inc. closed in positive territory for the year on Monday, in the latest sign of improving sentiment toward the iPhone maker.】

item.title: 中国中粮集团正在权衡出售芝加哥最后一个谷物码头的事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国最大食品公司的贸易部门中粮国际有限公司（Cofco International Ltd. ）正在探索各种方案，包括出售其芝加哥谷物码头。【原文：Cofco International Ltd., the trading arm of China’s largest food company, is exploring options including a sale for its Chicago grain terminal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 速汇金的贷款重新定价在交易初期陷入困境后已完成
item.description: 由于评级较低的公司急于降低借贷成本，而投资者又对高息债务趋之若鹜，速汇金国际公司（MoneyGram International Inc.【原文：MoneyGram International Inc. concluded a $398 million leveraged loan repricing after sweetening offer terms last week, as lower-rated firms rush to lower borrowing costs and investors clamor for higher-interest debt.】

item.title: 瑞士贸易商 Sucafina 收购越南顶级罗布斯塔生产商 Mercon 的资产
item.description: 瑞士咖啡贸易商苏卡菲娜公司（Sucafina SA）将收购 Mercon Coffee 公司在越南的分公司，从而扩大其在世界顶级罗布斯塔咖啡豆生产国的业务范围。【原文：Swiss coffee trader Sucafina SA will purchase Mercon Coffee Corp.’s unit in Vietnam, expanding its reach in the world’s top producer of robusta beans used to make instant coffee.】

item.title: 咆哮的凯蒂猫在 Reddit 上发表关于 GameStop 的帖子，预示着 4.85 亿美元的纸上财富
item.description: 这只是一张投资组合的截图，由一个与基思-吉尔有关的账号发布在 Reddit 上，没有任何评论。【原文：It was just a screenshot of a portfolio, posted without comment on Reddit by an account associated with Keith Gill.】

item.title: 在 Suzano 计划竞购之际，国际纸业寻求让 DS 放心
item.description: 据知情人士透露，国际纸业公司（International Paper Co.【原文：International Paper Co.’s top boss traveled to London to reaffirm his company’s commitment to merger partner DS Smith Plc, downplaying a takeover offer from Suzano SA that threatens to derail their pending £5.8 billion ($7.4 billion) deal, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 马士基上调盈利预测，原因是红海航线中断导致运价上涨
item.description: 作为全球贸易的风向标，A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S上调了全年利润预期，称红海的拥堵对全球供应线的影响比之前预期的要大，这反过来又提高了运费。【原文：A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S, a bellwether for global trade, raised its full-year profit forecast, saying the congestion in the Red Sea is having a larger than previously expected impact on the world’s supply lines, which in turn is boosting freight rates.】

item.title: 雪佛龙澳大利亚液化天然气工厂停工加剧全球供应困境
item.description: 澳大利亚一个关键的液化天然气出口设施的一个部分周一停止了生产，在挪威的管道问题抑制了欧洲的天然气流之后，全球供应有可能进一步收紧。【原文：A section of a key liquefied natural gas export facility in Australia halted production Monday, threatening to further tighten global supplies after a pipeline issue in Norway curbed flows in Europe.】

item.title: 美国银行称，美国蓝筹股公司比杠杆率所暗示的更健康
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，受评级上调、盈利增长加快和利润率提高等因素的影响，美国公司发现从投资级市场借款的成本正在降低。【原文：US companies are finding it cheaper to borrow from the investment-grade market, buoyed by a wave of ratings’ upgrades, faster earnings growth and improving profit margins, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利警告美国大选威胁热门宏观交易
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）称，随着投资者急于削减风险敞口，围绕美国大选的不确定性上升可能危及今年最受欢迎的一些宏观交易。【原文：Rising uncertainty around the US election could endanger some of this year’s most popular macro trades as investors rush to cut exposures, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 陷入困境的宾夕法尼亚州连锁医院准备进行 10 亿美元债务转换
item.description: 陷入困境的宾夕法尼亚州连锁医院 Tower Health 计划交换现有债务并筹集更多资金，以寻求扭亏为盈。【原文：Struggling Pennsylvania hospital chain Tower Health plans to exchange current debt and raise additional funds as it pursues a turnaround.】

item.title: Planet Fitness 启动 8 亿美元债务出售计划
item.description: 连锁健身房 Planet Fitness 周一开始出售以公司大部分资产为抵押的 8 亿美元债券，这是最近一系列被称为整体业务证券化交易中的最新一笔。【原文：Planet Fitness, a gym chain, on Monday started selling $800 million of bonds backed by most of the company’s assets, the latest in a string of recent deals known as whole business securitizations.】

item.title: 安德鲁-左在 2021 年的 "备忘录狂热 "中被烧伤，再次做空 GameStop
item.description: GameStop Corp. 的最新狂热吸引了一位meme-stock热潮的主要批评者--也是2021年的一位著名输家—从旁观者手中接过了新的空头头寸。【原文：The latest GameStop Corp. frenzy has coaxed a big critic of the meme-stock craze – and a notable loser back in 2021 — off the sidelines with a new short position.】

item.title: 比尔-阿克曼的潘兴广场美国基金目标筹资 250 亿美元
item.description: 据直接了解该计划的人士称，比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场公司（Pershing Square）计划为新的封闭式基金募集 250 亿美元，预计将吸引美国散户投资者的兴趣，这将使该公司管理的付费资产增加一倍以上。【原文：Bill Ackman’s Pershing Square aims to raise $25 billion for a new closed-end fund expected to draw interest from US retail investors, which would more than double the fee-paying assets the firm manages, according to people with direct knowledge of the plans.】

item.title: PAI 意大利合伙人 Cavalieri 将离开私募股权投资公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，PAI Partners 意大利旗舰基金的负责人将在五年后离开这家收购公司。【原文：The head of PAI Partners’ flagship fund in Italy is leaving the buyout firm after five years, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为国债供应增长需求充足
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The US Treasury appears to have scope to boost the supply of short-term bills as a share of its total debt load based on the potential for increased demand from several key investor segments, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 米莱推动美元化后阿根廷人突然需要比索
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统在竞选期间挥舞着印有他面孔的百元美钞，但由于他的经济计划，阿根廷人突然比以往任何时候都更需要比索。【原文：President Javier Milei wielded US hundred-dollar bills with his face on them during the election campaign, but Argentines suddenly need pesos more than ever thanks to his economic plan.】

item.title: Skydance 将以每股 23 美元的价格收购派拉蒙有表决权股票
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Skydance Media 计划向派拉蒙全球公司有投票权股票的投资者提供每股 23 美元的股票，作为其与这家影视巨头合并计划的一部分。【原文：Skydance Media plans to offer $23 a share to investors in Paramount Global’s voting stock as part of its plan to merge with the film and TV giant, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 捷克部长认为赤字有望达到 110 亿美元的目标
item.description: 捷克财政部长兹比内克-斯坦尤拉（Zbynek Stanjura）表示，捷克似乎有望将全年预算赤字控制在 2,520 亿克朗（约合 111 亿美元）的核定限额内。【原文：The Czech Republic appears to be on track to keep its full-year budget deficit within the approved limit of 252 billion koruna ($11.1 billion), according to Finance Minister Zbynek Stanjura.】

item.title: 德国电信投资者德国复兴信贷银行将出售 25 亿欧元股票
item.description: 德国电信股份公司最大的投资者--德国国有银行复兴信贷银行（KfW）将出售 1.1 亿股股票，发行价约为 25 亿欧元（27 亿美元）。【原文：Deutsche Telekom AG’s largest investor, German state-owned bank KfW, is selling 110 million shares in an offering valued at about €2.5 billion ($2.7 billion).】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金抛售软件股，原因是人工智能分割了科技领域
item.description: 对冲基金正在抛售软件类股票，因为人们越来越担心谁会在人工智能大潮中落伍。【原文：Hedge funds are unloading software stocks as concerns mount about who’ll be left behind in the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 经济学家认为加拿大央行降息后债券市场温和反弹
item.description: 大多数经济学家表示，加拿大央行将在周三降息，他们认为，当第一次降息最终发生时，政府债券将出现温和反弹。【原文：A majority of economists say the Bank of Canada will lower rates on Wednesday, and they believe government bonds will stage a modest rally when the first cut finally happens.】

item.title: 负债 5000 万美元的费城艺术学院将关闭
item.description: 艺术大学是费城一所培养未来动画师和舞蹈家的私立学院，欠下大约 5000 万美元的市政债务。【原文：University of the Arts, a private college in Philadelphia that trains future animators and dancers with roughly $50 million of municipal debt outstanding, is abruptly closing after its finances deteriorated.】

item.title: 欧佩克（OPEC）原油产量保持稳定，但主要成员国违反配额规定
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）原油产量连续第三个月保持稳定，而主要成员国伊拉克和阿拉伯联合酋长国的原油产量继续超过其配额。【原文：OPEC’s crude production remained steady for a third month while key members Iraq and the United Arab Emirates continued to pump above their assigned quotas.】

item.title: 查塔姆资产公司敦促辛克莱避免激进的再融资交易
item.description: 查塔姆资产管理公司（Chatham Asset Management）自称是辛克莱公司（Sinclair Inc.【原文：Chatham Asset Management, calling itself one of the largest creditors to Sinclair Inc., urged the broadcaster to resist maneuvers that divide lender collateral in order to refinance its upcoming maturities.】

item.title: 新指控浮出水面，道明银行贿赂问题蔓延至佛罗里达州
item.description: 新近有指控称，多伦多道明银行佛罗里达分行的一名长期工作人员收受了一系列 200 美元的贿赂，通过规避反洗钱防御措施帮助客户将数百万美元转移到哥伦比亚，这使该银行在美国的法律问题如雨后春笋般增加。【原文：Fresh allegations that a longtime Toronto-Dominion Bank branch worker in Florida took a series of $200 bribes to help clients move millions to Colombia by skirting anti-money-laundering defenses are adding to the lender’s mushrooming US legal problems.】

item.title: 沿海天然气管道公司开始销售加拿大有史以来最大一笔债券
item.description: 加拿大西部的管道项目 Coastal GasLink LP 将出售至少 50 亿加元（36.7 亿美元）的票据，这将是有史以来最大的以卢比计价的公司债券交易。【原文：Coastal GasLink LP, a pipeline project in Western Canada, is selling at least C$5 billion ($3.67 billion) of notes in what is set to be the largest loonie-denominated corporate bond deal ever.】

item.title: 小额贷款市场面临 190 亿美元的供应潮，为两年来最大规模
item.description: 随着投资者为两年来最大的新债券发行量做好准备，今年市政债券销售的持续激增没有显示出任何放缓的迹象。【原文：The relentless surge in municipal bond sales this year is showing no signs of slowing down as investors brace for the biggest jump in new issuance in two years.】

item.title: Blackstone 的 Blitzer 就奥格斯堡俱乐部的潜在出售事宜与 Lazard 进行了接触
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德国足球俱乐部奥格斯堡（FC Augsburg）的一位重要投资者正在考虑出售该俱乐部，其价值可能超过 1.5 亿欧元（1.63 亿美元）。【原文：A key investor of German football club FC Augsburg is sounding out a potential sale that could value the team at more than €150 million ($163 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】
